import React, { useState } from 'react' export default function AddNote() { const[note, setNote]=useState({ date:"", task:"", status:"" }) const{date,task,status}=note const onInputChange=(e)=>{ setNote({...note,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } const onSubmit=()=>{ e.preventDefault(); } return (
